positions.description: Working with account managers, cyber security leadership, HR Global Employment screening team and customer security representatives to notify and track to completion, requests for HP personnel to complete a customer mandated/specific background investigation and/or drug screening.
positions.title: Personnel Assurance Coordinator - Cyber Security

positions.description:
Review section processes within the PSU staff; recommend and implement any identified improvements including training/cross training. Conduct yearly performance evaluations. 

Coordinates with federal supervisor, team lead and section chief on all section activities and directions; liaises with Government and TAPE HQ as required.

Research, analyze, verify and order required investigations from external government agencies. Receive and process NAC and EFR uploads via OPM e-delivery. Verify, validate and complete vendor invoicing.

Knowledgeable of current DHS employment application requirements with the proven ability to assist applicants in making needed corrections. Reviewed applications (SF86, SF85P, and SF85) and analyzed contents to determine accuracy and completeness.

Evaluates work performance of subordinates; gives advice, counsel, or instruction to employees on both work and administrative matters.

System data validation consisting of error reports, discrepancy reports between databases, corrections, removals and terminations.
positions.title: Investigations Team Lead

positions.description:
Assisted with an executive summary/presentation of a criminal alien case for prosecution and with a complex case for congressional review. 

Worked with an officer during the court order release of a permanent resident. Assisted in the enrollment to Alternative to Detention Program, placement of the GPS monitor and monitored the alien. 

Observed a case at the Dallas Federal Court and observed the inspection of Johnson County Detention Center.  

Training in the use of restraints, officer safety protocols and high profile cases. 

Updated alien files in the Enforce Alien Removal Module (EARM). Routed files and developed statistical graphs for the Dallas Field Office.
positions.title: Internship - Enforcement and Removal Operations
